sections.text: Harvard Business School’s MBA is a two‑year, full‑time general management program that uses the case method and experiential learning to develop leaders who make a difference in the world.

items: Required Curriculum (RC) in the first year
Elective Curriculum (EC) with 100+ courses in the second year
Field‑based learning opportunities and global experiences
sections.text: The MBA begins with a structured Required Curriculum and continues with a flexible Elective Curriculum, complemented by field‑based learning and cross‑registration.
